vibesExplanation:
The workout video titled "Day 5 - Deepen  |  MOVE - A 30 Day Yoga Journey" is highly indicative of "The Zen Flow" vibe due to its focus on grounding, mindful, and breath-centered movement. The description emphasizes deepening the relationship with the 'subtle body and breath,' highlighting a slow, intentional approach characteristic of The Zen Flow. Furthermore, the comments reflect a calming and connected experience, noting the joy of observing nature and the feeling of being enveloped in the practice, all hallmarks of this vibe.
